quote_first: I swipe for the time with wet thumbs:
quote_last: I’m early. Very early. I’d consider this a good thing if any part of my plan could be called that. I swallow. None of my plan is certain.
title: Bath Haus
author: P.J. Vernon

quote_last: and I heard Father come home in his van and I moved the bed up against the door so he couldn’t get in and he came into the house and he and Mother shouted at each other.
title: The Curious Incident Of The Dog In The Night-Time
author: Mark Haddon
